food.title: Gusto Manager
food.subtitle: Discover in a few steps how Gusto Manager transforms your restaurant's daily management.

1.title: Create Your Personalized Space
1.content: Start by entering the essential information about your restaurant: opening hours, contacts, social media. A unique setup for optimal online presence.

2.title: Import Your Menu
2.content: Easily add your dishes, drinks, and wines to the interface. Organize your menu as you wish and create attractive offerings in just a few clicks.

3.title: Manage Everything from One Place
3.content: Activate the features you need: online reservations, gift cards, news updates. A single dashboard to control it all.

4.title: Automate Your Operations
4.content: Let the platform automatically manage your reservations, track availability, and update your menu. Save valuable time daily.

5.title: Grow Your Business
5.content: Analyze your performance, retain customers, and optimize your organization with integrated tools. Grow your establishment with ease.
